text: Meghan Lino (born 13 August 1984) is an American wheelchair curler who competes in international level events. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Falmouth, Massachusetts Category:American female curlers Category:American wheelchair curlers Category:Wheelchair curlers at the 2014 Winter Paralympics Category:Wheelchair curlers at the 2018 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic wheelchair curlers of the United States
title: Meghan Lino
